Producer: Robert Teitel, Tika Sumpter, Richard Tanne
Production Co: Columbia Records, IM Global, State Street Pictures, Roadside Attractions
Rating: PG-13 (A Violent Image|A Drug Reference|Brief Strong Language|Smoking)
Synopsis: Future U.S. President Barack Obama (Parker Sawyers) and lawyer Michelle Robinson (Tika Sumpter) go on a fateful first date in the summer of 1989.
Title: Southside With You
